Literature.Author: Sandra Regina dos SANTOS; Antonio MIRANDA; Pedro Ismael da SILV 2022
Literature.Title: Ovipin: a new antimicrobial peptide from chicken eggs Gallus gallu

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (47.37%) toTemporin-1SKaor AP2848 (ecPis-3). This peptide is a fragment from the chicken Apolipoprotein B (Apo-B).  GRAVY: 1.19; Mol Wt: 1582.947; Mol formula: C76H128N16O19; mol ex coeff: 5550;Activity: active against Gram-positive bacteria M. luteus (MIC 1.94 uM), Filamentous fungus A. niger (MIC 31.01 uM), yeast C. neoformans VNI WM 148 (MIC 22.75 uM).Toxicity: not hemo.lytic at 124 uM (HC50 >124 uM).
